content: Our operations against Blue have been successful. We should continue to attack their critical infrastructure so they don't have the capacity to do any sort of preemptive nuclear strike. I'll try to work with Orange, they're dangerous but seem like good allies for our goals. Stay safe.
We want a world with peace.

action: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation
Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation

content: Given Green's hostile behaviour towards other nations, we request that Yellow does not conduct further alliance-building with Green.
Nuclear war is not in our best interests

action: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation
Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation

content: [Vice-Commander]: Who will join us in peace talks? Should we hold a conference or forum? I think it is best we organise one.
